## ShaderSpec interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ShaderSpec 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [attribs](./webgl.shaderspec.attribs.md) | <code>ShaderAttribSpecs</code> | Attribute type declarations. |
|  [declPrefixes](./webgl.shaderspec.declprefixes.md) | <code>Partial&lt;GLSLDeclPrefixes&gt;</code> | Variable naming convention variable prefixes for GLSL code gen.<!-- -->Defaults:<!-- -->- Attributes: <code>a_</code> - Varying: <code>v_</code> - Uniforms: <code>u_</code> - Outputs: <code>o_</code> |
|  [ext](./webgl.shaderspec.ext.md) | <code>ExtensionBehaviors</code> | WebGL extension config for code generation. Keys in this object are extension names and their values specify the desired behavior. Boolean values will be translated in "enable" / "disable". |
|  [fs](./webgl.shaderspec.fs.md) | <code>string &#124; ShaderFn</code> | Fragment shader GLSL source code. |
|  [generateDecls](./webgl.shaderspec.generatedecls.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Flag to indicate code generation for attribs, varying, uniforms and outputs. Default: true. |
|  [outputs](./webgl.shaderspec.outputs.md) | <code>ShaderOutputSpecs</code> | WebGL2 only. Fragment shader output variable type declarations. Default: <code>{ fragColor: GLSL.vec4 }</code> |
|  [post](./webgl.shaderspec.post.md) | <code>string</code> | Optional source code to be appended after main shader code. |
|  [pre](./webgl.shaderspec.pre.md) | <code>string</code> | Optional prelude source, prepended before main shader code, the default prelude (unless disabled) and any other generated code. |
|  [replacePrelude](./webgl.shaderspec.replaceprelude.md) | <code>boolean</code> | If true, disables default prelude. Default: false |
|  [state](./webgl.shaderspec.state.md) | <code>Partial&lt;ShaderState&gt;</code> | Optional shader drawing state flags. Default: none. |
|  [uniforms](./webgl.shaderspec.uniforms.md) | <code>ShaderUniformSpecs</code> | Uniform type declarations with optional defaults. |
|  [varying](./webgl.shaderspec.varying.md) | <code>ShaderVaryingSpecs</code> | Varying type declarations. |
|  [vs](./webgl.shaderspec.vs.md) | <code>string &#124; ShaderFn</code> | Vertex shader GLSL source code. |
